solution_line_template: There are {initial_men}/{women_divisor}= <<{initial_men}/{women_divisor}={women}>>{women} women at the event.
Hence, there are a total of {initial_men} + {women} = <<{initial_men}+{women}={total_men_women}>>{total_men_women} men and women at the event.
So, the total number of children at the event is {total_guests} - {total_men_women} = <<{total_guests}-{total_men_women}={initial_children}>>{initial_children}.

After Oleg added {added_children} children to the guest list, there are a total of {initial_children} + {added_children} = <<{initial_children}+{added_children}={final_children}>>{final_children} children.
